title: Marie-�laine
text: I bought my glasses for almost half the price of my local optitian. It was cheaper and faster. I don't want to pay for the fancy decor of the store. I had the same or even better than what I could have bought from the store for way less money. Honestly I am not rich and it took a burden from me to find smartglasses. Since I wear my glasses everyday I've been able to afford very nice glasses who makes me feel pretty.
